general: Implement the 'Dark Modern' theme strictly. No light mode toggle for MVP unless requested.
Use 'Outfit' font for all headings and 'DM Sans' for body text. Import them via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
Apply the 'Glassmorphism' style to the Dashboard sidebar and floating elements.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the Dashboard main view.
Ensure all interactive elements have `data-testid` attributes.
Do not use generic gradients. Use the specified 'hero_glow' or subtle noise textures.

pages.landing: Use the 'hero_background' image with a heavy dark gradient overlay. The CTA should be the 'primary' gradient color.
pages.dashboard: Sidebar should be fixed left (desktop) or sheet (mobile). Main content area uses the Bento grid.
pages.auth: Simple, centered card on a dark background with subtle 'tracing beam' effect.

components.charts: Use Recharts with the custom color palette defined in 'colors.functional'.
components.calendar: Customize Shadcn calendar to match the dark theme (no white backgrounds).

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
